name: vscode-export-for-ai-chat
description: Copies the current fileâ€™s content to the clipboard in a format that is suitable for pasting into an AI chat.
author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

export-for-ai-chat.template.markdownDescription: Handlebars template for the AI chat prompt. Available variables: `workspace`, `workspaceFolder`, `items` (array of context items). Each item in `items` has properties: `code`, `file`, `fileName`, `fileRelative`, `folder`, `folderName`, `folderRelative`, `isWholeFile`, `language`, `languageId`. Available helpers: `blankLine`, `newLine`, `trim`, `fence`, `escapeFences`, `isMultiple`, `json`.
export-for-ai-chat.template.description: Handlebars template for the AI chat prompt. Available variables: workspace, workspaceFolder, items. Each item in items has properties: code, file, fileName, fileRelative, folder, folderName, folderRelative, isWholeFile, language, languageId. Available helpers: blankLine, newLine, trim, fence, escapeFences, isMultiple, json.

export-for-ai-chat.showNotifications.description: Show notifications after copying code to clipboard

export-for-ai-chat.countTokens.description: whether to include the o200k_base token count in the notification
export-for-ai-chat.countTokens.markdownDescription: whether to include the [o200k_base](https://github.com/dqbd/tiktoken/blob/main/js/README.md) token count in the notification

scripts.build_test: fse emptyDir out/test && bun build ./test/code/*.ts --outdir out/test --target node --format cjs  --entry-naming [name].test.cjs --external vscode
scripts.clean: fse remove out && fse remove temp && fse remove .vscode-test
scripts.pack: fse emptyDir out/vsix && NODE_ENV=production bun run build && cp license.txt out/bun && cd out/bun && vsce package --out ../vsix/$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.vsix
scripts.test: bun test ./test && bun run build && bun run build_test && vscode-test
